description:
The M4 Mac mini is so efficient, they couldn't fit the power button on the front.

Here are the resources I mentioned:

  - M4 Mac mini full test data: https://github.com/geerlingguy/sbc-reviews/issues/57
  - M4 Mac mini HPL efficiency: https://github.com/geerlingguy/top500-benchmark/issues/47
  - M4 Mac mini LLM efficiency: https://github.com/geerlingguy/ollama-benchmark/issues/2
  - M4 Mac mini power button bracket: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:6826809

title: The M4 Mac mini's RIDICULOUS efficiency
